definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: I was a little sick on the road trip too but I had some soup and felt a lot better.
sentences.chinese: 打客場時我生了點小病，後來喝了點湯，就舒服多了。

sentences.english: A teacher at a school for blind kids is taking his school's soccer team to an "away game".
sentences.chinese: 一個盲校的老師帶着學校的足球隊出去“客場作戰”。

sentences.english: Houston last reeled off nine victories in a row on the road in 1993.
sentences.chinese: 火箭隊最近一次取得客場九連勝是在1993年。

sentences.english: The Molineux men have not won at Arsenal since September 1979.
sentences.chinese: 而狼上次客場戰勝阿森納是在1979年9月。
冰鎬安全抱膝客場插槽。

sentences.english: Michael Carrick insists United's trip to bottom-of-Group-C Bursaspor won't be easy.
sentences.chinese: 卡里克認爲曼聯客場挑戰布爾薩的比賽不會輕鬆。

sentences.english: But even more striking is the disparity between home and road.
sentences.chinese: 但是更引人注目的是主客場的差距。

sentences.english: They should work each team at home and on the road.
sentences.chinese: 他們得爲每個球隊的客場和主場作裁判。

sentences.english: During the 4 games of this roadie, you saw the good and the bad qualities of this team come to fore.
sentences.chinese: 在這四個客場比賽中，球隊的表現有好但亦有壞。

sentences.english: Man City have won none of their last five Premier league away games, losing three of these games.
sentences.chinese: 曼城近五個客場未嘗勝績，其中輸了3場。

sentences.english: Winning on the second night of a back-to-back on the road is always a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，贏下客場背靠背的二場比賽，總是件好事。

sentences.english: When the draw is made for home and away games, we get away ones on Wednesdays.
sentences.chinese: 當抽籤決定主客場時，我們在週三都被抽中客場比賽。

sentences.english: When the draw is made for home and away games, we get away ones on Wednesdays.
sentences.chinese: 當抽籤決定主客場時，我們在週三都被抽中客場比賽。

sentences.english: JCF: So neither one is likely to play on this upcoming road trip then?
sentences.chinese: 所以他們兩個都不會參加即將到來的客場之旅？

sentences.english: Opener Macedonia, the Netherlands 2 to 1 away victory away, get good start.
sentences.chinese: 首戰馬其頓，荷蘭客場2比1客場告捷，取得開門紅。

sentences.english: Opener Macedonia, the Netherlands 2 to 1 away victory away, get good start.
sentences.chinese: 首戰馬其頓，荷蘭客場2比1客場告捷，取得開門紅。

definition: half of a game or contest/half-court
total victory/to excel by far/name of a tank/slam
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
to face off against one's adversary (military, sports etc)
